name: Maslow Redux
description: Document, discuss and track the performance of your users' needs

FORCE_SSL.description: When enabled, redirects HTTP connections to HTTPS

INSTANCE_NAME.description: The name of your Maslow instance (eg. 'GOV.UK Maslow')

MASLOW_HOST.description: The URL to your Maslow instance, used to build links in emails (eg. 'http://example.org/')

EMAIL_FROM_ADDRESS.description: The email address that auto-generated emails (eg. password resets) will appear to be sent from (eg. 'noreply@example.org')
